segment: Privacy Policy   Geekdo takes your privacy seriously. Please read the following to learn more about our privacy policy.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment is a generic introduction to the privacy policy, indicating the company's commitment to privacy without providing specific details.

segment: Geekdo does not rent, sell, or share personal information about you with other people or companies , except when we have your explicit permission (for example, to pass on your contact information when you have won a contest). You will not get on a spammer's list because of your interactions with Geekdo.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment states that Geekdo does not rent, sell, or share personal information with others, except with explicit permission, indicating a 'Does Not' policy in general.

segment: Geekdo collects personal information when you register with Geekdo, when you use Geekdo products or services, when you visit Geekdo pages or the pages of certain Geekdo partners, and when you enter Geekdo contests. Geekdo may combine information about you that we have with information we obtain from business partners or other companies.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of personal information by Geekdo when users register, use products or services, visit pages, or enter contests. It also mentions combining this information with data obtained from partners or other companies.

segment: When you register we ask for information such as your name, e-mail address, birth date, gender, zip code, occupation, industry, and personal interests. Once you register with Geekdo and sign in to our services, you are not anonymous to us.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of identifiable personal information during registration, such as name, email, and more, for providing basic service features to registered users.

segment: Geekdo collects information about your transactions with us.

model_analysis.explanation: The statement indicates that Geekdo collects information regarding transactions, which typically involves financial data, for the purpose of operating and securing the service for users with accounts.

segment: Geekdo automatically receives and records information on our server logs from your browser, including your IP address, Geekdo cookie information, and the page you request.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the automatic collection of information by Geekdo from users' browsers, including IP address and cookies, for service operation and security purposes.

segment: Geekdo uses information for the following general purposes: to customize the advertising and content you see, fulfill your requests for products and services, improve our services, contact you, conduct research, and investigate abuse.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of information for purposes such as customizing advertising and content, fulfilling requests, improving services, contacting users, conducting research, and investigating abuse, which aligns with personalization/customization.

segment: We partner with ValueClick to serve ads and/or collect certain information when you visit our website. ValueClick may use cookies or web beacons to collect non-personally identifiable information during your visit to this website in order to help show advertisements on other websites likely to be more interesting to you. To learn more about this "behavioral advertising" practice or to opt-out of this use of your anonymous information, you can visit http://www.valueclickmedia.com/member_privacy.shtml

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes how ValueClick collects non-personally identifiable information on the website using cookies or web beacons for behavioral advertising purposes.

segment: Geekdo reserves the right to modify all or some of this Privacy Policy at any time without notice. If we modify our Privacy Policy, we may post a notice on our website so our users are aware of what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any, we disclose it. We will use information only in accordance with the Privacy Policy under which the information was collected unless we have received explicit authorization from the appropriate user(s) to do otherwise.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment discusses potential changes to the Privacy Policy and mentions posting a notice on the website, indicating a general notice. It specifies that information use will adhere to the policy in effect at the time of collection unless explicit user consent is obtained, implying an opt-in choice for changes.

segment: We reserve the right to share information in order to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, violations of the Geekdo Terms of Service, situations involving potential threats to the physical safety of any person, or as otherwise required by law.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes sharing information to comply with legal requirements and address illegal activities, fraud, and safety threats.
